content: if you love texture lace and functional crochet pieces then you ll love the lacy dainty potholder this potholder uses the spider stitch - a combination of the single_crochet and chain stitch that creates a dense overlapping stitch this is a double sided and double thick potholder that you can use safely in your kitchen > this potholder pattern is part of the ** 2024 potholders galore crochet-along 1 ** and with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 13 potholder patterns one pattern every two weeks during the crochet-along > if you d like to be notified when new potholder patterns are released in the crochet-along you can join the 2024 crochet along email list ** here 2 ** > the free pattern for the lacy dainty potholder can be found ** here 3 ** > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 4 ** > you can learn more about the potholders galore crochet along ** here 5 ** skill level intermediate language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch single_crochet size this potholder measures approximately 8 x 8 but instructions are provided to customize the size of your potholder > materials * 5 0mm crochet hook needed * any medium 4 worsted weight 100% cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * 2 stitch markers or safety pins yardage * 150 yds / 137 m > yarn note 100% cotton or wool yarn is recommended for potholders because they don t burn under extreme heat cotton blends and other fibers like acrylic should not be used i hope you enjoy making your potholders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/2024-potholders-galore-crochet-along 2 https //thispixiecreates myflodesk com/pgcal 3 https //thispixiecreates com/spider-stitch-crochet-potholder/ 4 https //youtu be/kwrnmgn-kn8 5 https //thispixiecreates com/2024-potholder-crochet-along/
